Key Match Events: Max Strus helped implement a zone defense that was crucial in the Cavs' victory.
The Cavs held the Hornets to 15 points in the fourth quarter.
Four Cavs players scored 20-plus points, with Darius Garland leading with 25 points and 12 assists.
Post-Match Reflections: Jarrett Allen praised Max Strus for his role in implementing the zone defense.
Darius Garland highlighted the importance of the zone defense in their win.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Cavs are now 15-0 and the only undefeated team left in the league.
